label: AB4_oC20_41_a_2b-001
title: PtSn$_{4}$ ($D1_{c}$) Structure
comments:
The published atomic positions have $x_{2}=y_{3}$, $x_{3}=y_{2}$ and $z_{2}=-z_{3}$. This puts the system into space group $Ccce$ \#68, very similar to \href{current_web_home_dir/AB4_oC20_68_a_i-001}{PdSn$_{4}$}. 
 To get space group $Aba2$ \#41 we shifted the $y_{2}$ and $z_{3}$ positions slightly. Even then we could not place this in space group $Aba2$ until we adjusted the tolerance.  The original structure can be recovered using the command: 
 aflow -{-}proto=AB4\_oC20\_41\_a\_2b:Pt:Sn -{-}tolerance=0.001 -{-}params=a,b/a,c/a,x$_{2}$,y$_{2}$,z$_{2}$,x$_{3}$,y$_{3}$,z$_{3}$ 
 (Schubert, 1950) give the lattice constants in kX units.  We used the factor of 1.00202{\AA}/kX from (Wood, 1947) to convert to {\AA}ngstr\"{o}ms.
